field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senduserid,est.senddeptid,est.status,est.sendtime from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')

query-define.name: query2
query-define.where: est.status=1 and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and (est.mainrejecttimes is null or est.mainrejecttimes=0)

field-define.list-hsql: select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senduserid,est.senddeptid,est.status,est.sendtime from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and (est.mainrejecttimes is null or est.mainrejecttimes=0)

select distinct est.mainid,est.sheetid,est.title,est.senduserid,est.senddeptid,est.status,est.sendtime from est_circuitdispatch est where est.status=1 and est.sendtime>to_date('@beginTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.sendtime<to_date('@endTime@','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and est.mainrejecttimes is not null and est.mainrejecttimes!=0
